name: Hive Preserver
description:
You are a newborn alien, abducted from your home by evil scientists. They are trying to destroy your hive. You must return quickly if you want to keep it alive...

This game way made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 46: Keep it alive. It is a fast-paced first-person action game that you can with mouse and keyboard (recommended) or using a gamepad.

  • [WASD] / [L-Thumbstick] to move
  • [Mouse] / [R-Thumbstick] to aim
  • [Space] / [R-Trigger] to jump
  • Double Jumping performs a deadly pounce attack
  • Killing enemies restores your health.

Follow us on Twitter and on YouTube.  We would love to hear your feedback!

Jam Version bug fixes:

  • Main Menu: Gameplay Options ("Invert Y-Axis" and "Look Sensitivity") now actually appear in the Menu.

Music Credit:
